alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 17 at 12:44PM MDT until May 19 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pocatello ID has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Idaho... Trail Creek at Ketchum affecting Sun Valley Region zone. East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet affecting Wood River Foothills and Sun Valley Region zones. .Warm temperatures may melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Trail Creek Ketchum 7.0 5.8 Wed 12 pm MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. IDZ073-182100- /O.NEW.KPIH.FL.A.0006.230517T1844Z-230519T2242Z/ /TCKI1.0.SM.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.000000T0000Z.NR/ 1244 PM MDT Wed May 17 2023 ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Trail Creek at Ketchum. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Near bankfull from near Corral Creek and Trail Creek to the confluence of the Big Wood River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
